00057 /* Masks for co_flags (from Python's code.h) */
00058 #define CO_OPTIMIZED 0x01
00059 #define CO_NEWLOCALS 0x02
00060 #define CO_VARARGS 0x04
00061 #define CO_VARKEYWORDS 0x08
00062 #define CO_NESTED 0x10
00063 #define CO_GENERATOR 0x20
00064 #define CO_NOFREE 0x40
